name: Alna Intelligence
tagline: Lithuania IT Consulting and Services company
description:
Alna Intelligence is one of the leaders in the IT consulting and services market in the Baltic States. It has been the first company to provide comprehensive consulting on issues of IT system design, supply, installation, and maintenance.
* We are a leading company in the IT consulting market that develops solutions to change ineffective, hard-and-fast standards.
* Our unique technologies enable us to plan, install and manage solutions in a more effective fashion.
